data.title: David Burtka Will Play 54 Below; Husband Neil Patrick Harris Will Direct
data.meta_description: David Burtka, the acclaimed Broadway singing actor who recently married his long-time partner Neil Patrick Harris, will play 54 Below in November.
data.text:
Tony winner Harris will also direct the concerts, which are scheduled for Nov. 25-26. Show time both nights is 9:30 PM.

The musical director is Seth Rudetsky.

"Director Neil Patrick Harris has taken the conventional cabaret structure and turned it upside down, creating a show unlike anything that has been seen before," according to press notes. "Add the musical direction of Seth Rudetsky and you’re in for something special. Funny yet emotional, energetic yet raw – David Burtka’s concert will be a night to remember at 54 Below."

Burtka was last seen on Broadway as Tulsa in the Bernadette Peters revival of Gypsy. A trained chef, he has been seen on screen in "How I Met Your Mother," "On The Lot" and "Crossing Jordan."

Tickets will go on sale Sept. 25. There is a $50-$90 cover charge and a $25 food and beverage minimum.
